titles.title: You Have Won The Victors Crown

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
You have won the victor's crown
You have triumphed over sin and death
Your name is lifted high
And rings through all the earth

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Ev'ry demon spirit of hell
Trembles when Your might name is heard
And we Your church enforce
Your victory in the world

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Oh the glory of Your name
The splendour of Your name
None can compare
With the power of that name
You are Jesus
You are Lord
You are God
